At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of menace as a standard action. Enemies in this aura take a â€“2 penalty to AC and on attacks and saves as long as they remain inside the aura. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

This power replaces the Holy Lance power of the Good Domain or the Staff of Order power of the Law Domain.
